[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Wedding Planning System (WPS) defines requirements for managing wedding events, vendors, budgets, invitations, and guest coordination.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: WPS enables users to organize wedding tasks, book vendors, manage guest lists, and track budgets while integrating with financial and event services.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: WPS integrates with venue booking platforms, financial planning tools, and guest management services.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: WPS provides a web-based and mobile-friendly UI for wedding organizers, vendors, and guests.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: WPS supports printing invitations, venue access via QR codes, and integrations with event management kiosks.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: WPS connects with third-party APIs for vendor recommendations, payment processing, and RSVP management.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: WPS ensures secure communication via TLS encryption and multi-channel notifications.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: WPS optimizes storage for guest lists, vendor details, wedding registries, and budget tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: WPS automates wedding checklist management, budget tracking, RSVP handling, and scheduling.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: WPS supports multi-regional vendor availability, multiple currencies, and localized wedding customs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: WPS connects with catering, photography, venue, and travel service providers.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: WPS supports wedding planning checklists, budget tracking, vendor booking, invitation management, and event coordination.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: WPS serves engaged couples, wedding planners, vendors, and guests.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: WPS requires vendor and guest participation for successful event execution.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: WPS depends on vendor partnerships, financial service integrations, and wedding industry regulations.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: RSVP: Guest confirmation for event attendance.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with vendors and support secure online payments for bookings.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall provide wedding checklist management, event scheduling, and budget tracking with expense categorization (REQ-DB-001, REQ-INTF-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall enable searching, booking wedding vendors, designing invitations, and managing RSVPs (REQ-INTF-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall provide real-time communication channels for guests, vendors, and planners.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide a user-friendly UI with interactive planning tools and event dashboards.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall support 1,000 users and generate reports in 3 seconds.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store checklists, budget details, guest lists, and vendor contracts.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with financial and personal data security regulations.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to GDPR for user data protection and PCI DSS for secure payments.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall ensure data encryption, secure payments, and automated backup services (REQ-DSGN-001).

[SEC] 3. Verification: Budget accuracy checks, vendor booking validation, and security audits ensure reliability.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User guides, vendor manuals, and payment integration.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR compliance, PCI DSS guidelines, and wedding event management standards.
